content:
On this page, you register a car for use in a race and ensure that it is connected to Wi-Fi and is discoverable by DREM. To activate a car, select the fleet to which it belongs. Enter the **Hostname** and **Password** and optional Wi-Fi credentials for the car.

The community car console is an updated version of the web UI installed on the car implemented in Cloudscape. See https://github.com/aws-deepracer-community/deepracer-custom-console for more information.
